myers_briggs.title: Myersâ€“Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI)
myers_briggs.description: The Myersâ€“Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) is a personality test that categorises people into 16 different personality types based on four dichotomies. My test results from <url>16Personalities</url> concluded that my personality type is a Logistician (ISTJ-A) - someone who is hard-working, practical, dependable, meticulous and driven by a strong sense of duty. I bring structure and order to what I do, though I know my preference for tradition and routine can sometimes make adapting to change a bit of a challenge. My results showed the following percentage breakdown for each dichotomy:

introversion.title: Introversion
introversion.description: I prefer to focus on my inner world and thoughts rather than the outer world.

intuition.title: Intuition
intuition.description: I prefer to focus on the big picture and future possibilities rather than concrete facts.

feeling.title: Feeling
feeling.description: I prefer to make decisions based on personal values and how they affect others.

judging.title: Judging
judging.description: I prefer to plan things in advance and stick to a schedule rather than being spontaneous.

strengths_weaknesses.title: Strengths and Weaknesses
strengths_weaknesses.description: I believe that understanding my strengths and weaknesses is key to my personal and professional development, and serves as a guide on which abilities I need to focus working on and which I should continue to foster. Interestingly, both my colour profile and MBTI results provided very similar conclusions to where my strengths and weaknesses lie:

reliable.title: Reliable and Responsible
reliable.description: I am a reliable and responsible individual who can be counted on to deliver and complete tasks on time and to a high standard

problem_solving.title: Efficient Problem-Solving
problem_solving.description: I excel at finding realistic solutions to complex issues and solving them in a methodical and methodical manner

detail.title: Attention to Detail
detail.description: My attention to detail ensures nothing falls through the cracks

risk.title: Risk-Averse
risk.description: My preference for the familiar and established ways of doing things can limit potential for innovation and exploration

critical.title: Self-Critical
critical.description: My high self-expectations can lead to unnecessary stress

networking.title: Perfectionism
networking.description: I can be overly fixated on doing things the right way
